short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates BibLaTeX citations from chat conversations with OpenAI's ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ChatGPT Citation Generator is a browser extension designed to generate BibTeX citations from chat conversations in OpenAI's ChatGPT interface. This tool aims to assist students, researchers, and anyone who needs to cite conversations or information obtained from ChatGPT in their academic or professional work.
